title: Ep. 46: Verity Book Club + Channeling "Mediocre White Man Confidence."
itunes:title: Ep. 46: Verity Book Club + Channeling "Mediocre White Man Confidence."
description:
In this episode, we are talking about the craziest, scariest and most twisted book: Verity by Colleen Hoover. YOU GUYS. It’s hard to put this book into words, because it was so good and so messed up! Becca was terrified to quit reading this book because she knew she would have nightmares, and Grace went out drinking when she finished it. We can’t wait to hear your thoughts on it!

Also in this episode, WE SOLD OUT OUR LIVE SHOW! We are convinced you can do anything if you have the confidence of a mediocre white man. Also, Becca is obsessed with an investment app called Robinhood (use this link, you and Becca get a free stock), and Grace isn't as good of shape as she thought. 

Books Mentioned

Verity

Gone Girl

Final Girls

The Woman Inside

An Anonymous Girl

The Wife Between Us

The Last Mrs. Parrish

The Couple Next Door

The Last Time I Lied

The Woman in the Window

The Good Liar

So Here’s the Thing

Becoming

Rules of Magic

 

Can't get enough Bad On Paper?

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast
